analysis.description:
Reentrancy in SBITokenCrowdsale.processPayment (/unique_chucks/45/0x693bb391f6e2cb3c9b8d6a261916c662f9c86a45.sol#368-410):
	External calls:
	- remainingTokenBalance = token.balanceOf(saleWalletAddress) / tokenMultiplier (/unique_chucks/45/0x693bb391f6e2cb3c9b8d6a261916c662f9c86a45.sol#380-382)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- goalReached (/unique_chucks/45/0x693bb391f6e2cb3c9b8d6a261916c662f9c86a45.sol#383-384)

SBITokenCrowdsale.processPayment (/unique_chucks/45/0x693bb391f6e2cb3c9b8d6a261916c662f9c86a45.sol#368-410) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(saleWalletAddress,investorAddress,tokenAmount * tokenMultiplier) (/unique_chucks/45/0x693bb391f6e2cb3c9b8d6a261916c662f9c86a45.sol#393-394)

SBITokenCrowdsale.kill (/unique_chucks/45/0x693bb391f6e2cb3c9b8d6a261916c662f9c86a45.sol#431-436) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(saleWalletAddress,featureDevelopment.addr,featureDevelopmentAmount) (/unique_chucks/45/0x693bb391f6e2cb3c9b8d6a261916c662f9c86a45.sol)

Reentrancy in SBITokenCrowdsale.SBITokenCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/45/0x693bb391f6e2cb3c9b8d6a261916c662f9c86a45.sol#328-343):
	External calls:
	- tokenMultiplier = tokenMultiplier ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/45/0x693bb391f6e2cb3c9b8d6a261916c662f9c86a45.sol#336-337)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- saleGoal (/unique_chucks/45/0x693bb391f6e2cb3c9b8d6a261916c662f9c86a45.sol#340-342)
	- saleWalletAddress (/unique_chucks/45/0x693bb391f6e2cb3c9b8d6a261916c662f9c86a45.sol#337)

Reentrancy in SBITokenCrowdsale.processPayment (/unique_chucks/45/0x693bb391f6e2cb3c9b8d6a261916c662f9c86a45.sol#368-410):
	External calls:
	- remainingTokenBalance = token.balanceOf(saleWalletAddress) / tokenMultiplier (/unique_chucks/45/0x693bb391f6e2cb3c9b8d6a261916c662f9c86a45.sol#380-382)
	- token.transferFrom(saleWalletAddress,investorAddress,tokenAmount * tokenMultiplier) (/unique_chucks/45/0x693bb391f6e2cb3c9b8d6a261916c662f9c86a45.sol#393-394)
	External calls sending eth:

	State variables written after the call(s):
